pages.text: Adrenaline does not have to be the only thing racing through your veins in state of emergency.\\With every heart lost, the [Stratine Gem](book://resources/stratine) in this ring shines brighter and brighter, pulsating in the same rhythm as your racing heart - granting you an exponential damage boost.
